original_text: Come near to me! Listen to my message! From the beginning, I have not spoken secretly. When these things happen, I will already be there.’ Now the Almighty Lord has sent me, with the power of his Spirit. 48: These may be the words of Isaiah, as he brings God's message to his people. Or they may be the words of Cyrus, the king that God had chosen to punish the Babylonians. Come near to me! Listen to my message! These may be the words of Isaiah, as he brings God's message to his people. Or they may be the words of Cyrus, the king that God had chosen to punish the Babylonians.
korean_text: 너희는 내게 가까이 나아와 이것을 들으라 내가 처음부터 비밀히 말하지 아니하였나니 그것이 있을 때부터 내가 거기에 있었노라 하셨느니라 이제는 주 여호와께서 나와 그의 영을 보내셨느니라

sentences.original_text: Come near to me!
Listen to my message!
From the beginning,
I have not spoken secretly.
When these things happen,
I will already be there.'
Now the Almighty Lord has sent me,
with the power of his Spirit.
These may be the words of Isaiah,
as he brings God's message to his people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 백성들에게 하나님의 메시지를 전달하는 것처럼.

sentences.original_text: Or they may be the words of Cyrus,
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 이것은 고레스의 말일 수 있다,

sentences.original_text: the king that God had chosen
to punish the Babylonians.
Come near to me!
Listen to my message!
These may be the words of Isaiah,
as he brings God's message to his people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 백성들에게 하나님의 메시지를 전달하는 것처럼.

sentences.original_text: Or they may be the words of Cyrus,
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 이것은 고레스의 말일 수 있다,

sentences.original_text: the king that God had chosen
to punish the Babylonians.
